resources.string: Freezer temperature is at maximum value
Freezer temperature is at minimum value
"When you first open the app, you will be in the "Devices" category"
"On the bottom of the screen you can permanently find the three main categories of the app: "Devices", "Notifications" and "Routines""
"The category you are currently in is highlighted in blue, while the inactive ones are in grey"
"In "Devices" you will find the different device categories. To find a specific device, enter the device's category and it will appear in the category's list of devices"

"In "Notifications" you will find a list of your recent notifications. Every time a device changes its state, you will get notified. You can change your notification preferences on the "Settings" section"
"In "Routines" you will find a list of your saved routines. You can play a routine from the list or access its tasks by clicking on the routine"
"To access the "Help" or "Settings" sections, click on the three dots on the top right corner of the "Devices", "Notifications" or "Routines" categories"
"To perform an action on a device, first go to the "Devices" section"
"Select the category of the device you want to perform an action on"
"Find the device on the category's device list and click on it"
"All the device's functionalities will be displayed. To change a functionality click on the icon or word on the right side of the screen"
"To fave a device, go to the "Devices" category"
"Select the category of the device you want to fave"
"Find the device you want to fave in the category's list, and click on the heart button on the right of the device's name. You can unfave the device likewise"
"You can also access your favorite devices through the "Favorites" category in "Devices""
"To play a routine, first go to the "Routines" section"
"Find the routine you want to play and click the "Play" icon on the right of the routine's name"
"A message will be displayed notifying that the routine was played"
"If you want to see the routine's details, click on the desired routine from the list"
"You can also play a routine from the routine details screen by clicking on the "Play" icon at the top right corner of the screen"
"To see your recent notifications, go to the "Notifications" category"
"There, you will see a list of your notifications. Each notification represents a change on the status of one of your devices. Notifications are sent to you automatically"
"To delete one of your notifications, click on the "Trash" icon on the right of the notification"
"To delete all of your notifications, click on the button "Clean All" at the top of the list"
